title: Red Dead Redemption
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German and Spanish.   America, 1911. The Wild West is dying. When federal agents threaten his family, former outlaw John Marston is forced to pick up his guns again and hunt down the gang of criminals he once called friends. Experience an epic fight for survival across the sprawling expanses of the American West and Mexico, as John Marston struggles to bury his blood-stained past, one man at a time.  ©2006-2010 Rockstar Games. Rockstar Games,R*,Red Dead Redemption & other marks are trademarks of Take-Two Interactive Software.  All Rights Reserved.  This videogame is fictional; doesn’t depict any actual event/person/entity; and any similarities are coincidental.  Take Two doesn’t endorse or encourage engaging in any conduct depicted in game. Unauthorized copying, reverse engineering, transmission, public performance, rental, pay for play, or circumvention of copy protection is strictly prohibited.  Software use subject to license in manual & online at rockstargames.com/eula.  Non-transferable access to special features such as exclusive, unlockable, downloadable or online content, services, or functions may require single-use serial code, additional fee and/or online account registration (13+). Violation of EULA, Code of Conduct, or other policies may result in restriction or termination of access to game or online account.  Access to special features require internet connection, may not be available to all users, and may, upon 30 days notice, be terminated, modified, or offered under different terms.

childDownloads.title: A Short Film Made From Red Dead Redemption
childDownloads.description: Created and directed by John Hillcoat (the director of The Proposition and the Road), this short film chronicles a slice-in-time of protagonist John Marston as he tracks down his former outlaw and friend, Bill Williamson.  Along the way, Marston encounters many of Red Dead Redemption’s eclectic cast of dreamers, misfits and liars.

childDownloads.title: Armadillo Undead Outfit
childDownloads.description: The Wild West of Red Dead Redemption may have been dying, but this ranch-hand just won’t stay dead.

childDownloads.title: Armadillo Undead Outfit
childDownloads.description: From the saloon to the grave and back again, this lady’s seen it all…and it shows.

childDownloads.title: Armadillo Woman Outfit
childDownloads.description: Wear the period finery of a lady of Armadillo, complete with lace up heel boots, elegant striped coat and hat. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Bonnie MacFarlane Outfit
childDownloads.description: Wearing Bonnie MacFarlane’s vest and boots says you can shoot a gun, herd cattle, and still speak like a lady. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Colonel Allende T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Pledge your allegiance to the Mexican Army with this Avatar t-shirt featuring Colonel Allende. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Colonel Allende T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Pledge your allegiance to the Mexican Army with this Avatar t-shirt featuring Colonel Allende. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Cowboy Hat
childDownloads.description: A must have for every aspiring gunslinger.

childDownloads.title: Deadly Assassin Outfit
childDownloads.description: John Marston's Deadly Assassin outfit causes your Dead Eye meter to regenerate at twice the speed.  With more Dead Eye, you have more time to place each shot with total accuracy, making you the deadliest gunslinger in any fight.

childDownloads.title: Gameplay Series - Multiplayer Free Roam
childDownloads.description: Presenting the next step forward in open-world multiplayer. Watch the all-new Gameplay Series video devoted entirely to Multiplayer Free Roam mode in Red Dead Redemption – where the enormous single player world is your game lobby. Ride across the plains, face off against other players in gang hideouts, join organized games, challenges… form posses to ride, hunt and deathmatch together… and much more.

childDownloads.title: Gameplay Series: Introduction
childDownloads.description: “Gameplay Series: Introduction” is an in-depth 4-minute first look at the gameplay of Red Dead Redemption, revealing some of the features that make this game such an ambitious open world experience.  Rockstar Games’ next epic action-adventure, Red Dead Redemption, is coming April 27, 2010

childDownloads.title: Gameplay Series: Life in the West
childDownloads.description: “Life In The West” takes a deeper look at the struggle for survival on the frontier, from the everyday activities of life on the land such as breaking horses and herding cattle, to the use of stagecoaches and trains for fast travel.   Watch and discover the people, places and activities that populate the vast and beautiful world of Red Dead Redemption.

childDownloads.title: Gameplay Series: Life in the West Part II
childDownloads.description: While the first chapter of Life in the West merely touched on some of the dangers of frontier life in the world of Red Dead Redemption, Life in the West: Part II contains more depth and detail on the atmosphere of revolutionary turmoil and social unrest that was prevalent during the time period, with gangs overrunning decrepit towns and roadside bandits a constant threat.

childDownloads.title: Gameplay Series: Multiplayer Competitive Modes
childDownloads.description: Red Dead Redemption's Competitive Multiplayer serves up explosive modes with a distinctly Western twist – including the tense eye-to-eye Mexican standoff between players that starts every match. Experience team-based Gang matches, Free-For-All shootouts, and Capture The Bag modes in specially designed locations within Red Dead Redemption's vast and beautifully detailed open world.

childDownloads.title: Gameplay Series: Weapons & Death
childDownloads.description: Watch part two in the Red Dead Redemption Gameplay Video Series: Weapons & Death - a special in-depth look at Red Dead’s shooting – all the gunplay, weapons, “Dead-Eye” targeting, Natural Motion physics and so on that make up this key aspect of the game experience.

childDownloads.title: Gentlemen and Vagabonds Trailer
childDownloads.description: “Gentlemen & Vagabonds” is an introduction to just a few of the men of repute and dubious valor you’ll meet across the frontier – including Nigel West Dickens, Seth Briars, Professor Harold MacDougal and many more.

childDownloads.title: Golden Guns Weapon Pack
childDownloads.description: Available for use in the Red Dead Redemption Single Player story, the player who wields the Golden Guns receives more Fame for each kill.  The more Fame you get, the more in-game side missions become available.  So there will be more opportunities to duel, more kidnapped townsfolk to rescue and you can bribe lawmen for less.

childDownloads.title: Graveyards Trailer
childDownloads.description: The dead are arising from their earthen graves in graveyards across the frontier.  Prepare yourself to fight the zombie plague in the Undead Nightmare Pack for Red Dead Redemption.

childDownloads.title: Hunting and Trading Pack
childDownloads.description: The Hunting and Trading Outfits Pack features two new outfits with challenges to unlock in Red Dead Redemption single player. Buy guns and ammo at half the cost with the Savvy Merchant Outfit. Collect double the amount of skins and hides from hunting with the Expert Hunter Outfit.	This pack also includes compatibility features, enabling everyone online to see the new multiplayer characters used by those who have purchased any of the Add-On  packs.

childDownloads.title: Irish T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Nothing says fun like a t-shirt featuring the charming, debonair man of wit, Irish. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Irish T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Nothing says fun like a t-shirt featuring the charming, debonair man of wit, Irish. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: John Marston Outfit
childDownloads.description: Dress like former outlaw John Marston, a man on a mission to bury his criminal past, one body at a time. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: John Marston T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Wear the visage of this former gunslinger and hero of Red Dead Redemption. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: John Marston T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Wear the visage of this former gunslinger and hero of Red Dead Redemption. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Lasso
childDownloads.description: John Marston never goes anywhere without his Lasso – good for hog-tying bad guys and roping wild horses. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Legends and Killers Pack
childDownloads.description: The massive, action-packed world of Red Dead Redemption gets bloodier with the epic new multiplayer content of the Legends and Killers Pack.  Battle it out in nine new map areas, unlock new challenges and achievements, and hone your combat skills with the deadly Tomahawk.  Then play as classic characters from Red Dead Revolver -- Red Harlow, Annie Stoakes, Jack Swift, Buffalo Soldier, Shadow Wolf, Pig Josh, Ugly Chris, and Mr. Kelly. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Legends and Killers Pack Trailer
childDownloads.description: The Legends and Killers Pack for Red Dead Redemption is available now for download on Xbox LIVE® and boasts nine new multiplayer map locations, 8 multiplayer characters from Red Dead Revolver and the brand new Tomahawk projectile weapon.  All this, plus more opportunities to earn Achievements.  To see these new locations, multiplayer characters and the Tomahawk in action, watch the official Legends and Killers Pack Trailer.

childDownloads.title: Liars and Cheats Pack
childDownloads.description: The world of Red Dead Redemption multiplayer expands again with the new Liars and Cheats Pack. Challenge friends to horse races, try your luck with multiplayer Poker or Liar's Dice or hold your ground in the new Stronghold competitive mode. Reduce your enemies to dust with the Explosive Rifle. Play as legendary heroes and villains from the single-player story as you take on several new Gang Hideouts and Hunting Grounds in Free Roam.

childDownloads.title: Liars and Cheats Pack Trailer
childDownloads.description: The Liars and Cheats Pack Trailer shows off the huge array of new content featured in the Liars and Cheats Pack for Red Dead Redemption, including Multiplayer Poker, Liar's Dice, Horseracing with combat, the new Competitive Multiplayer mode Stronghold - and the very first glimpse of the devastatingly destructive Explosive Rifle.

childDownloads.title: Myths and Mavericks Bonus Pack
childDownloads.description: The Myths and Mavericks Bonus Pack offers another expansion to the world of Red Dead Redemption multiplayer. Battle your enemies in 11 new map areas including the snowy mountains of Cochinay, the army stronghold of El Presidio and the mining camp in Gaptooth Breach. Play as additional multiplayer characters from the single-player story: Landon Ricketts, Drew MacFarlane, Uncle, Javier Escuella, Captain Vincente De Santa, Deputy Eli, Deputy Jonah and Nastas. Also works with the standalone Undead Nightmare disc.
